org.jetel.util.protocols.webdav

Class WebdavClientImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.sardine.impl.SardineImpl
      • org.jetel.util.protocols.webdav.WebdavClientImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.github.sardine.Sardine, WebdavClient

    public class WebdavClientImpl
extends com.github.sardine.impl.SardineImpl
implements WebdavClient
    An extension of SardineImpl with a few customizations.

      • getIfExists

                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> headers)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        Just like the method above, but uses a custom response handler. Returns null if HTTP 404 (not found) is returned.

      • dirExists

        public boolean dirExists(java.lang.String url)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Check whether remote directory exists. If HEAD used by SardineImpl.exists(String) fails, GET is used instead. See http://code.google.com/p/sardine/issues/detail?id=48 and https://issues.alfresco.com/jira/browse/ALF-7883 for more information and motivation. This method should work both for WebDAV and plain HTTP, hence PROPFIND can't be used.
        Specified by:
        dirExists in interface WebdavClient
        Parameters:
        url - Path to the directory.
        Returns:
        True if the directory exists.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
